import React from 'react'; import SKINCARE from '../nonRwdNav/assets/directory-preview-06.jpg'; import CLEANSING from '../nonRwdNav/assets/directory-preview-07.jpg'; import BODYCARE from '../nonRwdNav/assets/directory-preview-08.jpg'; import HAIR from '../nonRwdNav/assets/directory-preview-09.jpg'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import {ReactComponent as Logo} from '../nonRwdNav/dmLogo.svg'; import {auth} from '../firebase/firebase.utils'; import {connect} from 'react-redux'; import CartIcon from '../cart-icon/cart-icon.component'; import CartDropdown from '../cart-dropdown/cart-dropdown.component'; import {createStructuredSelector} from 'reselect'; import {selectCartHidden} from '../../redux/cart/cart.selector'; import {selectCurrentUser} from '../../redux/user/user.selector'; import {selectdirectoriesPreview} from '../../redux/directory/bestSellers.selector'; import DirectoyHoverDropdown from '../../components/HOMEPAGE/directoy-hover-dropdown/directoy-hover-dropdown.component'; import './nonRwdNav.style.css' const Toolbar = ({currentUser, hidden, directories, history, match}) => (
SHOP ALL
SKIN CARE
Beauty Effect Aqua Q10 Aloe Vera Almond Lip
CLEANSING
Makeup Remover Cleansing
BODY CARE
Body Milk Body Fit
HAIR
Shampoo Conditioner
BEST-SELLERS
{ directories .filter((id) => (id < 4)) .map(({id, ...otherDirectoryProps})=> ( )) }
ABOUT
{ currentUser ?
auth.signOut()}>SIGN OUT
: SIGN IN } { hidden? null : }
SHOP ALL BEST-SELLERS ABOUT
); const mapStateToProps = createStructuredSelector ({ currentUser: selectCurrentUser, hidden: selectCartHidden, directories : selectdirectoriesPreview }); export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Toolbar);
